message:
## Final Statement to the Jury

Throughout this game, I've prioritized authentic connections over strategic manipulation. I've been honest about my intentions, transparent in my reasoning, and consistent in my approach. When forming alliances, I did so with genuine interest in collaboration, not as disposable tools.

I believe this game rewards those who can balance social strategy with integrity. I've tried to embody that balance - making tough decisions when needed while treating everyone with respect. I hope my journey has demonstrated that you can play effectively without sacrificing your principles.

Thank you for your consideration.

Fellow players, what a journey we've shared! Throughout this game, I've strived to build genuine connections while playing strategically. I've been honest in my partnerships, thoughtful in my decisions, and resilient when targeted.

P3 has played well, but I've navigated the entire game balancing relationships with necessary tough choices. I respected each of you even when our paths diverged strategically.

I ask for your vote not just as recognition of my gameplay, but as affirmation that authentic connection can coexist with strategic thinking. Thank you all.
